Probable Income of the Road.—In 1819, the parishes
St. Landry, Lafayette, Vermillion, St. Martin, St. Mail
Terrebonne and Lafourche Interior made upwards of se
venty-two thousand hogsheads of sugar. The four first
named parishes produced about twenty thousand bales of
